member.name: MFSensorDeviceType
member.summary: Specifies the type of a sensor device. A value from this enumeration is returned by .

member.name: MFSensorDeviceType.MFSensorDeviceType_Unknown
member.summary: The sensor device type is unknown.

member.name: MFSensorDeviceType.MFSensorDeviceType_Device
member.summary: The sensor device is a physical device. Physical cameras may register as KSCATEGORY_SENSOR_CAMERA or KSCATEGORY_VIDEO_CAMERA or both.

member.name: MFSensorDeviceType.MFSensorDeviceType_MediaSource
member.summary: The sensor device is a custom media source.

member.name: MFSensorDeviceType.MFSensorDeviceType_FrameProvider
member.summary: The sensor device is a legacy frame provider.
